```{r plot map of Cornwall,cache=FALSE,results="asis"}
library(leaflet)
library(htmlwidgets)
m<-leaflet() %>%
addTiles() %>%  
setView(lng = -4.7, lat = 50.4, zoom = 10)

saveWidget(m, 'example.html')
cat('<iframe src="example.html" STYLE="width:50%;height:125%"> </iframe>')
```
